itunes:summary:
The mother of a 14-month-old writes that she aspires to be a respectful parent, but her living situation presents some physical dangers for an active toddler, and lately she finds herself swatting his hand.  “I feel torn between two worlds," she says. "Is there any place in gentle parenting for a hand swat?”
